entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
